channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- Bits Service Release
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- Bits Service Release

item.title: CVE-2018-15800|2024-09-17T03:34:23.465Z -- cloud%20foundry -- bits%20service%20release
item.description: Cloud Foundry Bits Service, versions prior to 2.18.0, includes an information disclosure vulnerability. A remote malicious user may execute a timing attack to brute-force the signing key, allowing them complete read and write access to the the Bits Service storage.
